rule.description: The value of the F key in the Inline Image dictionary shall not be LZW, LZWDecode, Crypt, a value not listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, Table 6, or an array containing any such value.

error.message: Inline image uses LZW, Crypt or one of the unknown filters

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any integer greater than 2147483647. A conforming file shall not contain any integer less than -2147483648.

error.message: Integer value out of range

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any real number outside the range of +/-3.403 x 10^38

error.message: Real value out of range

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any string longer than 32767 bytes.

error.message: Maximum length of a String (32767) exceeded

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any name longer than 127 bytes.

error.message: Maximum length of a Name (127) exceeded

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain more than 8388607 indirect objects

error.message: Maximum number of indirect objects (8,388,607) in a PDF file exceeded

rule.description: A conforming file shall not nest q/Q pairs by more than 28 nesting levels

error.message: Maximum depth of graphics state nesting (q and Q operators) is exceeded

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain a DeviceN colour space with more than 32 colourants.

error.message: Maximum number of DeviceN components (32) is exceeded

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain a CID value greater than 65535.

error.message: Maximum value of a CID (65535) is exceeded

rule.description: The size of any of the page boundaries described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.11.2 shall not be less than 3 units in either direction, nor shall it be greater than 14 400 units in either direction.
rule.test: top - bottom >= 3 && top - bottom <= 14400 && right - left >= 3 && right - left <= 14400

error.message: One of the bage boundaries is out of range (3-14400) in one of the directions

rule.description: The file header shall begin at byte zero and shall consist of "%PDF-1.n" followed by a single EOL marker, where 'n' is a single digit number between 0 (30h) and 7 (37h)

error.message: File header does not start at byte offset 0 or does not comply with the requirements of PDF/A-2 specification

rule.description: The aforementioned EOL marker shall be immediately followed by a % (25h) character followed by at least four bytes, each of whose encoded byte values shall have a decimal value greater than 127

error.message: Binary comment in the file header is missing or does not comply PDF/A requirements

rule.description: The file trailer dictionary shall contain the ID keyword whose value shall be File Identifiers as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.4

error.message: Missing ID in the document trailer

rule.description: The keyword Encrypt shall not be used in the trailer dictionary

error.message: Encrypt keyword is present in the trailer dictionary

rule.description: No data can follow the last end-of-file marker except a single optional end-of-line marker as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.5.5.

error.message: Data is present after the last end-of-file marker

rule.description: The xref keyword and the cross-reference subsection header shall be separated by a single EOL marker

error.message: Spacings after the 'xref' keyword iin the cross reference table do not comply PDF/A specification

rule.description: Hexadecimal strings shall contain an even number of non-white-space characters

error.message: The number of hexadecimal digits in a hexadecimal string shall always be even

rule.description: A hexadecimal string is written as a sequence of hexadecimal digits (0–9 and either A–F or a–f)

error.message: Hexadecimal string contains non-white-space characters outside the range 0 to 9, A to F or a to f

rule.description: The value of the Length key specified in the stream dictionary shall match the number of bytes in the file following the LINE FEED (0Ah) character after the stream keyword and preceding the EOL marker before the endstream keyword.

error.message: Actual length of the stream does not match the value of the Length key in the Stream dictionary

rule.description: The stream keyword shall be followed either by a CARRIAGE RETURN (0Dh) and LINE FEED (0Ah) character sequence or by a single LINE FEED (0Ah) character. The endstream keyword shall be preceded by an EOL marker.

error.message: Spacings of keywords 'stream' and 'endstream' do not comply PDF/A specification

rule.description: A stream dictionary shall not contain the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParams keys
rule.test: F == null && FFilter == null && FDecodeParms == null

error.message: A stream object dictionary contains one of the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParms keys

rule.description: All standard stream filters listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.4, Table 6 may be used, with the exception of LZWDecode.

error.message: LZW compression is used

rule.description: Font names, names of colourants in Separation and DeviceN colour spaces, and structure type names, after expansion of character sequences escaped with a NUMBER SIGN (23h), if any, shall be valid UTF-8 character sequences.

error.message: The name object does not represent a correct Utf8 byte sequence

rule.description: The object number and generation number shall be separated by a single white-space character. The generation number and obj keyword shall be separated by a single white-space character. The object number and endobj keyword shall each be preceded by an EOL marker. The obj and endobj keywords shall each be followed by an EOL marker.

error.message: Spacings of object number and generation number or keywords 'obj' and 'endobj' do not comply PDF/A specification

rule.description: Only blend modes that are specified in ISO 32000-1:2008 shall be used for the value of the BM key in an extended graphic state dictionary.
rule.test: BM == null || BM == "Normal" || BM == "Compatible" || BM == "Multiply" || BM == "Screen" || BM == "Overlay" || BM == "Darken" || BM == "Lighten" || BM == "ColorDodge" || BM == "ColorBurn" || BM == "HardLight" || BM == "SoftLight" || BM == "Difference" || BM == "Exclusion" || BM == "Hue" || BM == "Saturation" || BM == "Color" || BM == "Limunosity"

error.message: The document uses the blend mode not defined in ISO 32000-1:2008

rule.description: All fonts and font programs used in a conforming file, regardless of rendering mode usage, shall conform to the provisions in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.6 and 9.7, as well as to the font specifications referenced by these provisions. Type - name - (Required) The type of PDF object that this dictionary describes; must be Font for a font dictionary

error.message: A Font dictionary has missing or invalid Type entry

rule.description: All fonts and font programs used in a conforming file, regardless of rendering mode usage, shall conform to the provisions in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.6 and 9.7, as well as to the font specifications referenced by these provisions. Subtype - name - (Required) The type of font; must be "Type1" for Type 1 fonts, "MMType1" for multiple master fonts, "TrueType" for TrueType fonts "Type3" for Type 3 fonts, "Type0" for Type 0 fonts and "CIDFontType0" or "CIDFontType2" for CID fonts
rule.test: Subtype == "Type1" || Subtype == "MMType1" || Subtype == "TrueType" || Subtype == "Type3" || Subtype == "Type0" || Subtype == "CIDFontType0" || Subtype == "CIDFontType2"

error.message: A Font dictionary has missing or invalid Subtype entry

rule.description: All fonts and font programs used in a conforming file, regardless of rendering mode usage, shall conform to the provisions in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.6 and 9.7, as well as to the font specifications referenced by these provisions. BaseFont - name - (Required) The PostScript name of the font

error.message: A BaseFont entry is missing or has invalid type

rule.description: All fonts and font programs used in a conforming file, regardless of rendering mode usage, shall conform to the provisions in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.6 and 9.7, as well as to the font specifications referenced by these provisions. FirstChar - integer - (Required except for the standard 14 fonts) The first character code defined in the font's Widths array

error.message: A non-standard simple font dictionary has missing or invalid FirstChar entry

rule.description: All fonts and font programs used in a conforming file, regardless of rendering mode usage, shall conform to the provisions in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.6 and 9.7, as well as to the font specifications referenced by these provisions. FirstChar - integer - (Required except for the standard 14 fonts) The first character code defined in the font's Widths array

error.message: A non-standard simple font dictionary has missing or invalid LastChar entry

rule.description: All fonts and font programs used in a conforming file, regardless of rendering mode usage, shall conform to the provisions in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.6 and 9.7, as well as to the font specifications referenced by these provisions. Widths - array - (Required except for the standard 14 fonts; indirect reference preferred) An array of (LastChar − FirstChar + 1) widths
rule.test: isStandard == true || (Widths_size != null && Widths_size == LastChar - FirstChar + 1)

error.message: Widths array is missing or has invalid size

rule.description: For any given composite (Type 0) font within a conforming file, the CIDSystemInfo entry in its CIDFont dictionary and its Encoding dictionary shall have the following relationship: - If the Encoding key in the Type 0 font dictionary is Identity-H or Identity-V, any values of Registry, Ordering, and Supplement may be used in the CIDSystemInfo entry of the CIDFont. - Otherwise, the corresponding Registry and Ordering strings in both CIDSystemInfo dictionaries shall be identical, and the value of the Supplement key in the CIDSystemInfo dictionary of the CIDFont shall be greater than or equal to the Supplement key in the CIDSystemInfo dictionary of the CMap.

error.message: CiDSystemInfo entries the CIDFont and CMap dictionaries of a Type 0 font are not compatible

rule.description: ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117 requires that all embedded Type 2 CIDFonts in the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.4, Table 117.

error.message: A Type 2 CIDFont dictionary has missing or invalid CIDToGIDMap entry

rule.description: All CMaps used within a PDF/A-2 file, except those listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.5.2, Table 118, shall be embedded in that file as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.7.5.
rule.test: CMapName == "Identity-H" || CMapName == "Identity-V" || CMapName == "GB-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GB-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBpc-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBpc-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBK-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBK-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBKp-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBKp-EUC-V" || CMapName == "GBK2K-EUC-H" || CMapName == "GBK2K-EUC-V" || CMapName == "UniGB-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniGB-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniGB-UFT16-H" || CMapName == "UniGB-UFT16-V" || CMapName == "B5pc-H" || CMapName == "B5pc-V" || CMapName == "HKscs-B5-H" || CMapName == "HKscs-B5-V" || CMapName == "ETen-B5-H" || CMapName == "ETen-B5-V" || CMapName == "ETenms-B5-H" || CMapName == "ETenms-B5-V" || CMapName == "CNS-EUC-H" || CMapName == "CNS-EUC-V" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UFT16-H" || CMapName == "UniCNS-UTF16-V" || CMapName == "83pv-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90ms-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90ms-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "90msp-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "90msp-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "90pv-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Add-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Add-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "EUC-H" || CMapName == "EUC-V" || CMapName == "Ext-RKSJ-H" || CMapName == "Ext-RKSJ-V" || CMapName == "H" || CMapName == "V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-HW-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UCS2-HW-V" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UTF16-H" || CMapName == "UniJIS-UTF16-V" || CMapName == "KSC-EUC-H" || CMapName == "KSC-EUC-V" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-H" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-V" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-HW-H" || CMapName == "KSCms-UHC-HW-V" || CMapName == "KSCpc-EUC-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UCS2-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UCS2-V" || CMapName == "UniKS-UTF16-H" || CMapName == "UniKS-UTF16-V" || embeddedFile_size == 1

error.message: A non-standard CMap is not embedded

rule.description: For those CMaps that are embedded, the integer value of the WMode entry in the CMap dictionary shall be identical to the WMode value in the embedded CMap stream.

error.message: WMode entry in the embedded CMap and in the CMap dictionary are not identical

rule.description: The font programs for all fonts used for rendering within a conforming file shall be embedded within that file, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 9.9.

error.message: The font program is not embedded

rule.description: Embedded fonts shall define all glyphs referenced for rendering within the conforming file.

error.message: Not all glyphs referenced for rendering are present in the embedded font program

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded Type 1 font contains a CharSet string, then it shall list the character names of all glyphs present in the font program, regardless of whether a glyph in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not.

error.message: A CharSet entry in the Descriptor dictionary of a Type1 font incorrectly lists glyphs present in the font program

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded CID font contains a CIDSet stream, then it shall identify all CIDs which are present in the font program, regardless of whether a CID in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not.

error.message: A CID Font subset does not define CIDSet entry in its Descriptor dictionary

rule.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file and used for rendering, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent.

error.message: Glyph width information in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary

rule.description: For all non-symbolic TrueType fonts used for rendering, the embedded TrueType font program shall contain one or several non-symbolic cmap entries such that all necessary glyph lookups can be carried out.

error.message: The embedded font program for a non-symbolic TrueType font does not contain any cmap subtables

rule.description: No non-symbolic TrueType font shall define a Differences array unless all of the glyph names in the Differences array are listed in the Adobe Glyph List and the embedded font program contains at least the Microsoft Unicode (3,1 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=1) encoding in the "cmap" table.

error.message: A non-symbolic TrueType font has encoding different from MacRomanEncoding or WinAnsiEncoding, or the glyphs in the Differences array can not be mapped to the embedded font glyphs via the Adobe Glyph List

rule.description: Symbolic TrueType fonts shall not contain an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

error.message: A symbolic TrueType font specifies an Encoding entry in its dictionary

rule.description: Symbolic TrueType fonts shall not contain an Encoding entry in the font dictionary, and the "cmap" table in the embedded font program shall either contain exactly one encoding or it shall contain, at least, the Microsoft Symbol (3,0 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=0) encoding.

error.message: The embedded font program for a symbolic TrueType font contains more than one cmap subtable

rule.description: A PDF/A-2 compliant document shall not contain a reference to the .notdef glyph from any of the text showing operators, regardless of text rendering mode, in any content stream.

error.message: The document contains a reference to the .notdef glyph

rule.description: Content streams shall not contain any operators not defined in ISO 32000-1 even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators.

error.message: A content stream contains an operator not defined in ISO 32000-1

rule.description: The profile stream that is the value of the DestOutputProfile key shall either be an output profile (Device Class = "prtr") or a monitor profile (Device Class = "mntr"). The profiles shall have a colour space of either "GRAY", "RGB", or "CMYK".

error.message: The embedded PDF/A Output Intent colour profile has invalid header

rule.description: If a file's OutputIntents array contains more than one entry, as might be the case where a file is compliant with this part of ISO 19005 and at the same time with PDF/X-4 or PDF/E-1, then all entries that contain a DestOutputProfile key shall have as the value of that key the same indirect object, which shall be a valid ICC profile stream.
rule.test: destOutputProfileIndirect == null || gOutputProfileIndirect == null || destOutputProfileIndirect == gOutputProfileIndirect

error.message: File's OutputIntents array contains output intent dictionaries with non-matching destination output profiles

rule.description: In addition, the DestOutputProfileRef key, as defined in ISO 15930-7:2010, Annex A, shall not be present in any PDF/X OutputIntent.

error.message: The output intent dictionary contains forbidden entry DestOutputProfileRef

rule.description: The profile that forms the stream of an ICCBased colour space shall conform to ICC.1:1998-09, ICC.1:2001-12, ICC.1:2003-09 or ISO 15076-1.
rule.test: (deviceClass == "prtr" || deviceClass == "mntr" || deviceClass == "scnr" || deviceClass == "spac") && (colorSpace == "RGB " || colorSpace == "CMYK" || colorSpace == "GRAY" || colorSpace == "LAB ") && version < 5.0

error.message: The embedded ICC profile is either invalid or does not satisfy PDF 1.7 requirements

rule.description: DeviceRGB shall only be used if a device independent DefaultRGB colour space has been set when the DeviceRGB colour space is used, or if the file has a PDF/A OutputIntent that contains an RGB destination profile.

error.message: DeviceRGB colour space is used without RGB output intent profile

rule.description: DeviceCMYK shall only be used if a device independent DefaultCMYK colour space has been set or if a DeviceN-based DefaultCMYK colour space has been set when the DeviceCMYK colour space is used or the file has a PDF/A OutputIntent that contains a CMYK destination profile.

error.message: DeviceCMYK colour space is used without CMYK output intent profile

rule.description: DeviceGray shall only be used if a device independent DefaultGray colour space has been set when the DeviceGray colour space is used, or if a PDF/A OutputIntent is present.

error.message: DeviceGray colour space is used without output intent profile

rule.description: For any spot colour used in a DeviceN or NChannel colour space, an entry in the Colorants dictionary shall be present.

error.message: A colorant of the DeviceN color space is not defined in the Colorants dictionary

rule.description: All Separation arrays within a single PDF/A-2 file (including those in Colorants dictionaries) that have the same name shall have the same tintTransform and alternateSpace. In evaluating equivalence, the PDF objects shall be compared, rather than the computational result of the use of those PDF objects. Compression and whether or not an object is direct or indirect shall be ignored.

error.message: Several occurrances of a Separation colour space with the same name are not consistent

rule.description: An ExtGState dictionary shall not contain the TR key

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the TR key

rule.description: An ExtGState dictionary shall not contain the TR2 key with a value other than Default

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the TR2 key with a value other than Default

rule.description: An ExtGState dictionary shall not contain the HTP key

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the HTP key

rule.description: All halftones in a conforming PDF/A-2 file shall have the value 1 or 5 for the HalftoneType key.

error.message: A Halftone has type other than 1 or 5

rule.description: Halftones in a conforming PDF/A-2 file shall not contain a HalftoneName key.

error.message: A Halftone dictionary contains the HalftoneName key

rule.description: Where a rendering intent is specified, its value shall be one of the four values defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, Table 70: RelativeColorimetric, AbsoluteColorimetric, Perceptual or Saturation.

error.message: A rendering intent with non-standard value is used

rule.description: An Image dictionary shall not contain the Alternates key

error.message: Alternates key is present in the Image dictionary(

rule.description: An Image dictionary shall not contain the OPI key

error.message: OPI key is present in the XObject dictionary(

rule.description: If an Image dictionary contains the Interpolate key, its value shall be false. For an inline image, the I key shall have a value of false.

error.message: The value of the Interpolate key in the Image dictionary is true

rule.description: A form XObject dictionary shall not contain any of the following: - the OPI key; - the Subtype2 key with a value of PS; - the PS key.

error.message: The form XObject dictionary contains a PS key, or a Subtype2 key with value PS, or an OPI key

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any reference XObjects

error.message: The document contains a reference XObject (Ref key in the form XObject dictionary)

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any PostScript XObjects

error.message: The document contains a PostScript XObject

rule.description: Annotation types not defined in ISO 32000-1 shall not be permitted. Additionally, the 3D, Sound, Screen and Movie types shall not be permitted.
rule.test: Subtype == "Text" || Subtype == "Link" || Subtype == "FreeText" || Subtype == "Line" || Subtype == "Square" || Subtype == "Circle" || Subtype == "Polygon" || Subtype == "PolyLine" || Subtype == "Highlight" || Subtype == "Underline" || Subtype == "Squiggly" || Subtype == "StrikeOut" || Subtype == "Stamp" || Subtype == "Caret" || Subtype == "Ink" || Subtype == "Popup" || Subtype == "FileAttachment" || Subtype == "Widget" || Subtype == "PrinterMark" || Subtype == "TrapNet" || Subtype == "Watermark" || Subtype == "Redact"

error.message: Unknown or not permitted annotation type

rule.description: Except for annotation dictionaries whose Subtype value is Popup, all annotation dictionaries shall contain the F key.

error.message: A dictionary of a non-Popup annotation does not contain F key

rule.description: If present, the F key's Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible, ToggleNoView, and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0.

error.message: One of the annotation flags Hidden, Invisible, ToggleNoView, or NoView is set to 1, or the Print flag is set to 0

rule.description: Text annotations should set the NoZoom and NoRotate flag bits of the F key to 1.

error.message: Text annotation has one of the flags NoZoom or NoRotate set to 0

rule.description: Every annotation (including those whose Subtype value is Widget, as used for form fields), except for the two cases listed below, shall have at least one appearance dictionary: - annotations where the value of the Rect key consists of an array where value 1 is equal to value 3 and value 2 is equal to value 4; - annotations whose Subtype value is Popup or Link.

error.message: An annotation does not contain an appearance dictionary

rule.description: For all annotation dictionaries containing an AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key. If an annotation dictionary's Subtype key has a value of Widget and its FT key has a value of Btn, the value of the N key shall be an appearance subdictionary, otherwise the value of the N key shall be an appearance stream.
rule.test: AP == null || ( AP == "N" && ( N_type == "Stream" || (Subtype == "Widget" && FT == "Btn" && N_type == "Dict") ) )

error.message: Annotation's appearance dictionary contains entries other than N or the N entry has an invalid type

rule.description: A Widget annotation dictionary or Field dictionary shall not contain the A or AA keys.

error.message: A Widget annotation contains either A or AA entry

rule.description: A Widget annotation dictionary or Field dictionary shall not contain the A or AA keys.

error.message: A Form field dictionary contains the AA entry

rule.description: The NeedAppearances flag of the interactive form dictionary shall either not be present or shall be false.

error.message: The interactive form dictionary contains the NeedAppearances flag with value true

rule.description: The document's interactive form dictionary that forms the value of the AcroForm key in the document's Catalog of a PDF/A-2 file, if present, shall not contain the XFA key.

error.message: The interactive form dictionary contains the XFA key

rule.description: A document's Catalog shall not contain the NeedsRendering key.

error.message: A document's Catalog contains NeedsRendering flag set to true

rule.description: The Launch, Sound, Movie, ResetForm, ImportData, Hide, SetOCGState, Rendition, Trans, GoTo3DView and JavaScript actions shall not be permitted. Additionally, the deprecated set-state and noop actions shall not be permitted.
rule.test: S == "GoTo" || S == "GoToR" || S == "GotToE" || S == "Thread" || S == "URI" || S == "Named" || S == "SubmitForm"

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type

rule.description: Named actions other than NextPage, PrevPage, FirstPage, and LastPage shall not be permitted.

error.message: Unknown or not permitted named action

rule.description: The document's Catalog shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary.

error.message: The document catalog dictionary contains an additional-actions dictionary (AA entry)

rule.description: The Page dictionary shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary.

error.message: The Page dictionary contains an additional-actions dictionary (AA entry)

rule.description: The value of pdfaid:part shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms. Files prepared in compliance with this part of ISO 19005 shall use a value of 2.

error.message: The "part" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is not equal to 2 for a PDF/A-2B conforming file.

rule.description: Level B conforming file shall specify the value of pdfaid:conformance as B.

error.message: The "conformance" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is not equal to "B" for a PDF/A-2B conforming file.

rule.description: A file specification dictionary, as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.11.3, may contain the EF key, provided that the embedded file is compliant with either ISO 19005-1 or this part of ISO 19005.

error.message: An embedded file does not comply to either ISO 19005-1 or ISO 19005-2

rule.description: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file shall contain the F and UF keys

error.message: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file does not contain either F or EF key
